lines: Ul'dah's come a long way since the Calamity. In the face of that terrible destruction, our people banded together to rebuild our great nation.
These tracks, which stretch across Thanalan, are a testament to that resolve. Beholding them fills me with pride.
During the course of my official tenure as a Sultansworn, I traveled the length and breadth of Eorzea. Those experiences molded me into the man I am today.
You have been blessed with the skills and opportunities to do the same, Forename. I pray you do not squander them.
Even in these dark times, you think to pay this old man a visit... You are kind, my ladylord. Very kind indeed.
But never you fear! Her Grace is alive and well, I am certain of it. That the incident has not been made public is proof positive of this.
...Or so I try to convince myself. I...I could not carry on otherwise...
I knew it could not be true! In my heart of hearts, I knew that Her Grace was still alive!
It must come as a great comfort to you as well, Forename, to be able to come and go as you please once more.
If truth be told, I was aware of your observing Lady Lilira from the shadows in the markets. Knowing you, though, I believed that you had good reason, and so pretended not to notice.
Suffice it to say I was beyond delighted to see the lovely orchestrion you and yours had crafted for my lady. You truly made her day, and in so doing made this old man's as well!

obj.n: ササガン大王樹の下で
ギルドへの私的な依頼
イシュガルド戦勝祝賀会
ミスリルスペクタクルズ
ウルダハンプライベート・グローブ
